questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against the undead on a ghost island under the control of Gecko Moria. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' encounter with a group of powerful fish-men and a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This power allows its user to manipulate darkness and gravity, famously held by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to transform into a dragon or a dragon-like creature. What is...?
questions.answer: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

questions.question: This ability, used by a member of the Blackbeard Pirates, allows the user to create and control earthquakes. What is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a musician known for his long nose and ability to create powerful sound-based attacks. Who is...?
